channel.title: CVE Feed for tychesoftwares -- Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tychesoftwares -- Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-4414|2024-10-22T19:45:08.285Z -- tychesoftwares -- abandoned%20cart%20lite%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 5.8.5. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the wcal_preview_emails() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to generate email preview templates via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
